content.rendered:
Directed by Subhash Kapoor.

Written by Subhash Kapoor.

Cast Akshay Kumar(Jagdish Mishra / Jolly). Huma Qureshi(Pushpa Pandey). Saurabh Shukla(Judge Tripathy). Annu Kapoor(Sachin Kantilal Mathur). Kumud Mishra(Suryaveer Singh). Sayani Gupta(Hina Siddiqui). Inaamulhaq(Iqbal Qadri). Manav Kaul(Iqbal Qasim). Rajiv Gupta(Birbal). Sanjay Mishra(Guruji). Saurabh Agnihotri(Gul Mohammad). Zia Ahmed(Reporter (as Ziya Ahmad)). V.M. Badola(Jolly’s Father). Ram Gopal Bajaj(Rizvi Sahab). Sudhanva Deshpande(CBI Officer). Avijit Dutt(V.K Paul). Iamrealmohsin(Poor Boy). Brijendra Kala(Dubeji). Jehaan Khambatta(Jolly’s Son). Ahmad Raza Khan(Judge Tripathi’s nephew). Faiz Khan(Mathur’s Male Assistant). Faiz Khan(Lawyer). Tareeq Ahmed Khan(COP). Amit Singh Kharbanda(Kashyap). Rishi Kulshreshtha(Inspector). Ganesh Kumar(Vinod Tiwari). Tarun Kumar(Baldev Singh Bhadoria).Shubhangi Latkar. Neeraj Mishra(Hazratganj shooter). Bhawani Muzamil(Police Officer (as Muzzamil Bhavani)). Dinesh Nag(Neighbour). Vinod Nagpal(Zahoor Siddiqui). Sunil Palwal(Fahim Butt (as Sunil Kumar Palwal)). Sitaram Panchal(Sitaram). Daddi Pandey(Siraj Alam (as Dadhi R. Pandey)). Sushil Pandey(Ramkumar bhadoria). Meena Patel(Jolly’s neighbour). Gillian Pinto(Mathur’s Female Assistant). Rockey Raina(Police Officer). A.R. Rama(Mushtaq).

Languages Hindi. Kashmiri. Urdu.

Producers Ashish Gupta. Mahesh Korade. Naren Kumar. Gaurav Nanda.

Production Fox STAR Studios.
